Key Match Events: Saurabh Netravalkar sent back Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma in his first two overs against India
Anrich Nortje picked up eight wickets in the middle phase, the second-highest after Adam Zampa's nine
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Aiden Markram hopes for better batting conditions in West Indies
Aaron Jones is expecting good support for USA in Antigua
USA have the highest run rate against spin of all the teams in the tournament - 11.04
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams batting second have won three out of four games here, with the surface good for batting
USA, in their first T20 World Cup appearance, are now A2, and will kickstart the Super Eight stage against South Africa
